title: Chicken Pizzaiola

ingredients.content: 80 g Edam cheese, cut in pieces

preparations.content: Place cheese in mixing bowl and grate <b>10 sec/speed 5<b>. Transfer to a bowl and set aside.
Place oil, onions and garlic in mixing bowl then chop <b>5 sec/speed 5<b>. Sauté <b>5 min/120°C/speed 1<b>.

Add tomatoes, stock cube and sugar. Place Varoma into position and place chicken breasts in Varoma dish and tray. Season with salt and pepper, cover and steam <b>20-25 min/Varoma/speed 1<b> until chicken is cooked through. Near to the end of this time,  preheat oven to 200°C.
Remove chicken and place in an ovenproof dish. Pour tomato sauce over chicken and sprinkle with reserved grated cheese and oregano. Bake for 10-15 minutes (200°C) until cheese is golden. Serve hot.

hintsAndTricks: Serve with a side salad or steamed vegetables.
